attributes.action: Students who are sitting there GCSES should be required to go to school.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do it because last year 2020 the classes of 2020 walked away with only there predicted grades which should of been there assessed grades to make it fair. I am petitioning this year to make sure that this year, year 11s have the opportunity to sit their GCSES and get the grades by themselves.
attributes.background: I want the government to put in place taking all other non-essential students and classes out of schools and focus on GCSE students to make sure that they are getting the best out of the education system during COVID19 times.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565780
